two.title: Time show message
two.a: To change the time of the message, go to the option "Hide Message After" and change the slide. To always show the message, check "Always Show Messages".

three.title: To Customize
three.a: When scrolling down, you will see a bar,with a label written "Custom Field", click on it and make the changes you want.

four.title: How use multiple styles at same time?
four.a: Add the other chat style in a new theme. After that click on the link icon and copy the chat. Put it in the scene that that style belongs.

one.title: How Install
one.a: When you click on the link, this popup will appear;
one.b: Click in “use” to apply to your current theme;
one.c: Go to the Alert Box and done!
one.d: Get the launch link and put in your streaming software.

two.title: How disable an alert?
two.a: To disable an alert, go to the alert who you want to disable.

b.title: Sound and volume
b.body:
You can change the sound file. Go to:
Sound > Upload button
And volume is bellow from the sound file uploader:
Sound Volume > Slide control

c.title: Alert delay
c.body:
Change the slide value to grow the delay:
Alert Text Delay > Slide control

a.title: Event List
a.body:
Enable Events, Min Bits and Max Events.
All Widgets > Event list >

a.title: Start a goal
a.body:
To start a new goal. That work for any type of goal.
All Widgets > type goal> Manage Goal , click in button End Goal. Setup the details of the goal.

b.title: Change to custom style
b.body: The goal is come using the simple style. To get the custom style, click in My Goal.
b.body2:
To change colors and font size, go to:
All Widgets > type goal> Settings > Custom Fields
